page.title:
Neutrinos Are Everywhere!
Neutrinos Are Everywhere!
page.enlisting:
• Neutrinos outnumber ordinary matter particles in the Universe
• Neutrinos outnumber ordinary matter particles in the Universe • N e u t r i n o s

page.normal_text:
Depending on their masses they may account for a fraction (few % ?) of the “dark matter”
Depending on their masses they may account for a fraction
(few % ?) of the “dark matter”

Neutrinos are important for stellar dynamics: ~ 6.61010 cm-2s-1 stream through the Earth from the sun. Neutrinos also govern Supernovae dynamics, and hence heavy element production.
Neutrinos are important for stellar dynamics: ~ 6.61010 cm-2s-1 N e u t r i n o s

stream through the Earth from the sun. Neutrinos also govern
Supernovae dynamics, and hence heavy element production.

If there is CP Violation in the neutrino sector, then neutrino physics might ultimately be responsible for Baryogenesis.
If there is CP Violation in the neutrino sector, then neutrino
physics might ultimately be responsible for Baryogenesis.

To understand the nature of the Universe in which we live we must understand the properties of the neutrino.
To understand the nature of the Universe in which we
live we must understand the properties of the neutrino.

page.title:
What are the Open Questions in Neutrino Physics From the APS Multi-Divisional Study on the Physics of Neutrinos
What are the Open Questions in Neutrino Physics
From the APS Multi-Divisional Study on the Physics of Neutrinos
page.normal_text:
What are the masses of the neutrinos?
What are the masses of the neutrinos?

What is the pattern of mixing among the different types of neutrinos?
What is the pattern of mixing among the different types of neutrinos?

Are neutrinos their own antiparticles?
Are neutrinos their own antiparticles?

Do neutrinos violate the symmetry CP? Are there “sterile” neutrinos? Do neutrinos have unexpected or exotic properties? What can neutrinos tell us about the models of new physics beyond the Standard Model?
Do neutrinos violate the symmetry CP?
Are there “sterile” neutrinos?
Do neutrinos have unexpected or exotic properties?
What can neutrinos tell us about the models of new physics beyond the Standard Model?

The answer to almost every one of these questions involves understanding how neutrinos interact with matter!
The answer to almost every one of these questions involves
understanding how neutrinos interact with matter!

Among the APS study assumptions about the current and future program:
Among the APS study assumptions about the current and future program:
page.enlisting:
“determination of the neutrino reaction and production cross sections required for a precise
“determination of the neutrino reaction and production cross sections required for a precise understanding of neutrino-oscillation physics and the neutrino astronomy of astrophysical and cosmological sources. Our broad and exacting program of neutrino physics is built upon precise knowledge of how neutrinos interact with matter.”
